title: Wicked Prince: A Ruthless Scion Preview Novella for The Ruthless Tycoons Series
description: Amber is a blind law student, struggling to make a difference after a past filled with crime and pain. For some reason, Jake Ferra, the hottest (she's overheard) guy in law school, has decided he wants her and only her. But what will happen when Jake turns out not to be Jake and her past comes back to haunt her in unexpected ways?  True Blue TT Reader Note: This novella was included in the Breaking Bad collection.  ****** NON KU READERS, PLEASE NOTE: This is a PREVIEW of my upcoming full-length novel, LUCA: Her Ruthless Don. If you don't want to pay for this preview, please wait for the full novel!
author: Theodora Taylor
